{{ZScriptNote}} '''[[Structs:SecPlane|SecPlane]]'''
native double '''ZatPointDist'''(Vector2 ''v'', double ''dist'') const
==Usage== Works similar to [[ZatPoint]] but a distance from the world origin can be manually specified. Normally the SecPlane's '''D''' value is used. Useful if a new z value needs to be calculated before performing an action (e.g. making sure the new z value does not clip into the ceiling/floor).
===Parameters=== *''v'' - The absolute xy map coordinate to check. *''dist'' - The distance to use from the world origin.
===Return Value=== Returns the z height of the plane at the given point and distance.
==Examples== {{noexamples}}
